description: MEMORANDUM Opinion and Order: For the reasons set forth in the attached order, Wemagine's motion to dismiss for lack of personal jurisdiction, R. 9, is granted. If Gutierrez wishes to seek leave to file an amended complaint, he must do so no later than twenty-one (21) days from the entry of this order. Any motion for leave to amend must include a copy of the proposed amended complaint, a redline version showing changes from the original complaint, and a brief of no more than five (5) pages explaining how the proposed amended complaint cures the deficiencies identified in this opinion. Signed by the Honorable Thomas M. Durkin on 1/26/2022. Mailed notice. (ecw, ) (Entered: 01/27/2022)
